data.text: i understand its a hostal. staff were nice. everything was good even if the room smelled a bit like the canals when we first entered the room.there is also a chance that we got our bed bug bites from the bed or curtain in the room. but who knows. i hope not.
data.title: customer service was perfect

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you very much Janreala for sharing your opinion. We are glad to know that you enjoyed the service you received. We are very proud of all our staff as we are able to offer a personalized service to all our guests. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on your future visits to the heart of our wonderful city.
owner_response.author: Artur Artigas

data.text:
Mare Nostrum Hostal was a perfect stay for me.  The location is midway down La Rambla only steps away from Metro station and bus stop. Views from the room provided endless people-watching entertainment. The desk staff was welcoming and helpful, the housekeepers were thorough, the breakfast host was cheerful and provided fine food service every day.  The Hostal is convenient, kept very clean, is a good value and is a comfy place to rest after days of travel and sightseeing. The Old Town proximity gave one easy access to explore Barri Gotiq, El Born, Raval neighborhoods. The large market, La Boqueria, is only a block away.  

As a senior traveler, I was a bit apprehensive about the stairs from ground level to first floor and elevator but they turned out not to be a big problem for me.  Mare Nostrum is an old building, but nicely renovated.  The only thing I wished for was a grab bar in the shower, to lend a feeling of greater security.

Mare Nostrum was a delightful place to stay for my first visit to Barcelona.  It will be my first choice when I return to this wonderful city.  Please check out the Mare Nostrum website as it informs about the management's ecological, environmental and humanitarian programs/concerns supported by their business.
data.title: Hostal Mare Nostrum Offers Great Location, Kind Staff, Cleanliness, and Breakfast!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: For reviews like these Julie, we love our job. As you mention, we are a small establishment in the heart of Barcelona very concerned with Corporate Social Responsibility. We always work hard to offer a personalized service to our customers from a sustainable point of view. We have an ideal location in the heart of the city center and a few meters from public transport. So you can access the main tourist attractions quickly and easily way. We have taken note of your suggestion regarding our showers, and although we have compact rooms, we will try to take measures in the future.  We will be very happy to welcome you in your future visits to the city.
owner_response.author: Artur Artigas

data.text:
The only reasons this Hostal received 2 stars was due to the location and the very nice breakfast included.
Our stay was 5 days.  Our 1st room was so small we could not open our suitcases on the floor.  When closed the suitcases had to go into the bathroom or between the single beds.  Very unhappy, I addressed the person at the checkin desk.  When advised we would be checking out in the morning and I wanted a refund.  That person immeciately found a larger room for us.  We accepted and stayed the 5 days.  Having said that.  There are NO amenities. I had to go to a neighborhood bar to obtain ice for drinks, bath towles are small and very well worn.  You will climb 2 flights of stairs to get to check in counter.  Staff was friendly and helpful.
If you are a single person and on a budget, this could be the place for your stay. If you are 2 people, be sure you don't get placed in the cramped rooms.
data.title: Small and No Amenities

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: We are sorry Jim that you didn't check our facility's features and we are glad that our staff still did their best to make sure you finally enjoyed your stay in the heart of Barcelona. As you mention, our rooms are compact but very functional. With everything you need to enjoy a comfortable stay. On our website you can find the size of the rooms including 360º photos. We are a Hostal that follows a very respectful policy with the environment. That is why we avoid the use of single-use products as much as possible. All our rooms have soap dispensers. We would like to add that the information folder in your room explains this and that you can request any of the most common amenities at the front desk. Again we regret any possible misunderstanding and as you mention we have a great staff of which we are very proud that always tries to offer a close and personalized service to all our customers. We hope that in your future reservations you will check carefully the establishment prior to booking to avoid misunderstandings. Greetings from Barcelona.
owner_response.author: Artur Artigas

data.text: Tiny room with tiny bathroom. Thin walls hearing other people in other rooms. This hotel is located on the 1st floor of a bldg which includes going up a 28 step (normally 14 steps/flr in US) winding cement staircase (see photos) to access from the G (ground) floor hall entry. It even includes in the Hotel Facility Accessibility Description: “Elevator” for handicap even including a wheel chair photo. All Guests are required to manually lift their own individual suitcases up a 28 step spiral cement staircase to get to their 1st floor Check In desk. If you are traveling with heavy luggages (ie: 50lbs each allowance for airline), you will be expected to walk up your suitcases to the 1st floor where a tiny elevator is located to get from Flr # 1-4. Their is no porter service. While the hotel discloses that an elevator is available from the 1st floor. It does not disclose that there are 28 steps spiral stairs for the guest to climb up to get to the 1st floor. There are over 70 photos provided by the hotel to show their rooms & facilities. However, no photos of the stairs? This false advertisement of “Handicap” accessibility is illegal and should be flagged by Travel websites.
data.title: WARNING!!!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Thank you Jeff Lim for sharing your review. We are sorry for any possible misunderstanding during your stay with us. Due to the structure of the building, we are unable to have an elevator at street level. As you mentioned, you only have to climb 25 steps to get to reception. Once at reception we have a small elevator that gives access to all rooms. This information is very clear on our website and in the confirmation email. As you mentioned, we are a hostal and we do not offer a bellboy/baggage service, however, when possible and as it was in your case, we try to help our guests with their luggage. We kindly ask that for your future reservations in any establishment that you check the place prior to booking to avoid any confusion and to be able to enjoy your vacation.
Greetings from Barcelona,
owner_response.author: Artur Artigas

data.text: Great stay at this hotel. Really lovely helpful staff fabulous breakfast with lots of choice and good nights sleep in family room - everything very clean. Would definitely stay again and would recommend - a solid centrally located budget hotel Thankyou!
data.title: Lovely hostel great staff clean and good for families

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: We are glad to hear that you and your family enjoyed a perfect stay in the heart of Barcelona. We are very proud of our staff as we are able to offer a personalized service to our guests. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again in your future visits to the city.
owner_response.author: Artur Artigas
